testsuite.name: Order page
testsuite.details: Test scenarios and test cases for the page https://stg.securewebbilling.net/order-sale.php?optid=75&aff=&page_from=main&id=German%20Shepherd&targetdom=http://trainpetdog.com/German%20Shepherd&mid=&cmversion=4&cmphase=1111&tracker=segment_puppy&referrer=sales-page&cvs=5_4

testcase.name: Form layout
testcase.summary: Test visibility of all inputs, selects and submit button
testcase.preconditions:
Internet connection

Web page https://stg.securewebbilling.net/order-sale.php?optid=75&aff=&page_from=main&id=German%20Shepherd&targetdom=http://trainpetdog.com/German%20Shepherd&mid=&cmversion=4&cmphase=1111&tracker=segment_puppy&referrer=sales-page&cvs=5_4 is visible

 

SETUP Open page https://stg.securewebbilling.net/order-sale.php?optid=75&aff=&page_from=main&id=German%20Shepherd&targetdom=http://trainpetdog.com/German%20Shepherd&mid=&cmversion=4&cmphase=1111&tracker=segment_puppy&referrer=sales-page&cvs=5_4

step.actions: Check visibility of the heading "Your Details:" in the order form
step.expectedresults: Heading "Your Details:" in the order form is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "Your First Name"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "Your First Name" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "Last Name"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "Last Name"  is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "E-Mail Address"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "E-Mail Address" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "Phone Number"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "Phone Number" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the heading "Contact Address:" in the order form
step.expectedresults: Heading "Contact Address:" in the order form is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "Street"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "Street" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "City"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "City" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "Zip"
step.expectedresults: Iinput with the placeholder "Zip" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the select with the selected value "Country - Please Select"
step.expectedresults: Select with the selected value "Country - Please Select" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the select with the selected value "State - Please Select"
step.expectedresults: Select with the selected value "State - Please Select" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the heading "Card Details:" in the order form
step.expectedresults: Heading "Card Details:" in the order form is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "Name on Card"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "Name on Card" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "Credit Card Number"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "Credit Card Number" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the Visa Mastercard image right from the input from card number
step.expectedresults: Visa Mastercard image right from the input from card number is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "MM"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "MM" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "YY"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "YY" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the input with the placeholder "CVV"
step.expectedresults: Input with the placeholder "CVV" is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the image right from the input from CVV
step.expectedresults: Image right from the input from CVV is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the checkbox above submit button
step.expectedresults: Checkbox above submit button is visible

step.actions: Check visibility of the button with text  "Click Here To Continue"
step.expectedresults: Button with text  "Click Here To Continue" is visible

testcase.name: Fill form
testcase.summary: Enter required values in all inputs, selects, and check checkbox
testcase.preconditions:
Internet connection

Web page https://stg.securewebbilling.net/order-sale.php?optid=75&aff=&page_from=main&id=German%20Shepherd&targetdom=http://trainpetdog.com/German%20Shepherd&mid=&cmversion=4&cmphase=1111&tracker=segment_puppy&referrer=sales-page&cvs=5_4 is visible

 

SETUP Open page https://stg.securewebbilling.net/order-sale.php?optid=75&aff=&page_from=main&id=German%20Shepherd&targetdom=http://trainpetdog.com/German%20Shepherd&mid=&cmversion=4&cmphase=1111&tracker=segment_puppy&referrer=sales-page&cvs=5_4

step.actions: Enter first name in the Your First Name input and wait for the label Your First Name to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: First name has been entered in the Your First Name input and label Your First Name has been displayed above input

step.actions: Click outside the input Your First Name and validate that green ok icon is displayed right from the input
step.expectedresults: Input Your First Name is not in focus and green ok icon has been displayed

step.actions: Enter last name in the Last Name input and wait for the label Last Name to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: Last name has been entered in the Last Name input and label Last Name has been displayed above input

step.actions: Click outside the input Last Name and validate that green ok icon is displayed right from the input
step.expectedresults: Input Your Last Name is not in focus and green ok icon has been displayed

step.actions: Enter valid email in the E-Mail Address input
step.expectedresults: Valid email has been entered in the E-Mail Address input

step.actions: Enter phone number in the Phone Number input and wait for the label Phone Number to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: Phone number has been entered in the Phone Number input and label Phone Number has been displayed above input

step.actions: Click outside the input Phone Number and validate that green ok icon is displayed right from the input
step.expectedresults: Input Phone Number is not in focus and green ok icon has been displayed

step.actions: Enter street in the Street input and wait for the label Street to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: Street has been entered in the Street input and label Street has been displayed above input

step.actions: Click outside the input Street and validate that green ok icon is displayed right from the input
step.expectedresults: Input Street is not in focus and green ok icon has been displayed

step.actions: Enter city in the City input and wait for the label City to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: City has been entered in the Cityt input and label City has been displayed above input

step.actions: Click outside the input City and validate that green ok icon is displayed right from the input
step.expectedresults: Input City is not in focus and green ok icon has been displayed

step.actions: Enter zip code in the Zip input and wait for the label Zip to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: Zip code has been entered in the Zip input and label Zip has been displayed above input

step.actions: Click outside the input Zip and validate that green ok icon is displayed right from the input
step.expectedresults: Input Zip is not in focus and green ok icon has been displayed

step.actions: Click on the select with value Country - Please Select and choose country (non US or Canada)
step.expectedresults: Country (non Us or Canada) has been selected

step.actions:
Wait for the

  1. label Country to be displayed above Country select
  2. green ok icon to be displayed right from Country select
step.expectedresults:
1. label Country has been displayed above Country select
  2. green ok icon has been displayed right from Country select

step.actions:
Wait for the

  1. label State to be displayed above State select
  2. green ok icon to be displayed right from Country select
  3. value in the State select should be Outside United States and Canada
step.expectedresults:
1. label State has been displayed above State select
  2. green ok icon has been displayed right from Country select
  3. value in the State select is Outside United States and Canada

step.actions: Enter card holder name in the Name on Card input and wait for the label Name on Card to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: Card holder name has been entered in the Name on Card input and label Name on Card has been displayed above input

step.actions: Click outside the input Name on Card and validate that green ok icon is displayed right from the input
step.expectedresults: Input Name on Card is not in focus and green ok icon has been displayed

step.actions: Enter card number in the Credit Card Number input and wait for the label Credit Card Number to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: card number has been entered in the Credit Card Number input and label Credit Card Number has been displayed above input

step.actions: Enter two digit expiration month in the MM input and wait for the label Expiry date to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: Two digit expiration month has been entered in the MM input and label Expiry date has been displayed above input

step.actions: Enter two digit expiration year in the YY input
step.expectedresults: Two digit expiration year has been entered in the YY input

step.actions: Enter cvv code in the CVV input and wait for the label CVV to be displayed above input
step.expectedresults: Cvv code has been entered in the CVV input and label CVV has been displayed above input

step.actions: Click outside the input CVV and validate that green ok icon is displayed right from the input
step.expectedresults: Input CVV is not in focus and green ok icon has been displayed

step.actions: Check checkbox below inputs and wait for the green ok icon to be displayed right from checkbox
step.expectedresults: Checkbox below inputs has been checked and ok icon has been displayed right from checkbox
